name: The Jeffy Game
description:
Experience the adventure of a lifetime through the eyes of Jeffy.

DEFEAT THE GREEN BEANS, COLLECT THE CEREAL BOXES, AND CLAIM VICTORY!

Each carefully crafted level will leave you wanting more with its innovative puzzle elements and thought-provoking worlds.

DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES?

Throughout your journey you will encounter different types of enemies and obstacles that you must overcome.

SECRET LEVEL!

If you collect all of the hidden cereal boxes you will unlock a secret level in which you will discover lore relating to the Kable10 universe. After you have finished the game you can also unlock Golden Jeffy which allows for even more replayability and fun!
